verses.verse: Peter <S%G4074><s%>, an <S%G652>apostle<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, to the elect who are <S%G3927>sojourners<s%> of the Dispersion <S%G1290>in<s%> <S%G4195>Pontus<s%>, <S%G1053>Galatia<s%>, <S%G2587>Cappadocia<s%>, <S%G773>Asia<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1588>Bithynia<s%>,

according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4268>foreknowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4473>sprinkling<s%> of the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied<s%>.

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be the <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> <S%G313>begat<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G313>again<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>,

unto <S%G1519><s%> an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G862>incorruptible<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G283>undefiled<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that fadeth not <S%G263>away<s%>, <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>,

who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> are <S%G5432>guarded<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> a <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>.

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> ye greatly <S%G21>rejoice<s%>, though <S%G737>now<s%> for a little <S%G3641>while<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> need <S%G1163>be<s%>, ye have <S%G2076>been<s%> put to <S%G3076>grief<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4164>manifold<s%> <S%G3986>trials<s%>,

that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G1383>proof<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, being <S%G4183>more<s%> <S%G5093>precious<s%> than <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G622>perisheth<s%> <S%G1161>though<s%> it is <S%G1381>proved<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>, may be <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>having<s%> <S%G1492>seen<s%> ye <S%G25>love<s%>; <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%>, though <S%G737>now<s%> ye <S%G3708>see<s%> him <S%G3361>not<s%>, <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G4100>believing<s%>, ye <S%G21>rejoice<s%> greatly with <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G412>unspeakable<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> full of <S%G1392>glory<s%>:
receiving <S%G2865><s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, even the <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G5590>of<s%> your <S%G5590>souls<s%>.

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1567>sought<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> searched <S%G1830>diligently<s%>, who <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that should come <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>:

searching2045, 1519 <S%G5101>what<s%> time <S%G2228>or<s%> what manner <S%G4169>of<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> did <S%G1213>point<s%> <S%G4303>unto<s%>, when it testified beforehand the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1391>glories<s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> should follow <S%G3326>them<s%>.

To <S%G3739>whom<s%> it was <S%G601>revealed<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> unto <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> unto <S%G2254>you<s%>, did they <S%G1247>minister<s%> these <S%G846>things<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> have <S%G312>been<s%> <S%G312>announced<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that preached the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> unto <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> sent <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>; which <S%G3739>things<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1937>desire<s%> to <S%G3879>look<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> girding <S%G328>up<s%> the <S%G3751>loins<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1271>mind<s%>, be <S%G3525>sober<s%> and set your <S%G1679>hope<s%> <S%G5049>perfectly<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> that is to be <S%G5342>brought<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

as <S%G5613><s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G5218>obedience<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> fashioning yourselves according <S%G4964>to<s%> your <S%G4386>former<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the time of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G52>ignorance<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532>like<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> he who <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> is <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G846>ye<s%> yourselves also <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> manner of <S%G391>living<s%>;
because <S%G1360><s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G1096>Ye<s%> shall be <S%G40>holy<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye call <S%G1941>on<s%> him as <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> without respect of <S%G678>persons<s%> <S%G2919>judgeth<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> each <S%G1538>man<s%>'s <S%G2041>work<s%>, <S%G390>pass<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3940>sojourning<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>:

knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G3084>were<s%> <S%G3084>redeemed<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> with corruptible <S%G5349>things<s%>, with <S%G694>silver<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5553>gold<s%>, <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3152>vain<s%> manner of <S%G391>life<s%> handed down from your <S%G3970>fathers<s%>;
but <S%G235><s%> with <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G5613>blood<s%>, as of a <S%G286>lamb<s%> without <S%G784>spot<s%>, <S%G299><s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

who was <S%G4267>foreknown<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2078>end<s%> of <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> your <S%G5209>sake<s%>,

who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> are <S%G4100>believers<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> him846, 1453 <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>; so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Seeing ye have <S%G48>purified<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> your <S%G5218>obedience<s%> to the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G505>unfeigned<s%> love of the <S%G5360>brethren<s%>, <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2513>the<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1619>fervently<s%>:

having been begotten <S%G313>again<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G4701>seed<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> of <S%G862>incorruptible<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, which <S%G2198>liveth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%>.

For <S%G1360><s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5528>grass<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G444>thereof<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G438>flower<s%> of <S%G5528>grass<s%>. The <S%G5528>grass<s%> <S%G3583>withereth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G1601>falleth<s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of good tidings <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.
